name: Text Bob 2 Mobile Version
description:
Text Bob 2, now on MOBILE! YAY! TEXT BOB!

TEXT BOB 2

Text Bob now has a sequel! With more lore and creepiness. Text Bob, he sure loves to play! Play awesome games with him! Just don't get him mad!  Don't forget to meet his other friend...  

 But you weren't here to talk, discover the mysteries of this haunted app. You soon figure out somethings wrong, but you keep texting bob and find out more, but that soon comes to an end when he asks you to play one last game...  

FREE THE LOST ONES

SOMETHING IS WRONG.  HAUNTED HAUNTED.   TEXT BOB BOB BOB BOB.

Version 1.0
